Author: orkestrels
Text: ahh itâ€™s super hard to deal with food as a present! if you want to eat one, i would try to do an exercise in what the food is besides what it is in the context of an ed. like as an expression of your brother caring about you/liking you, instead of a symbol of meaning, or temptation, etc., and then if you think you can do it without hurting yourself after, you can try eating one?   you could also share it with the rest of your family or your friends; he probably doesnâ€™t expect you to eat the whole lot. stay safe and know itâ€™s just brownies! even if your ed says itâ€™s more than that, one brownie never hurt anyone and is not a reason to punish yourself after ðŸ’–
